title: Pomegranate
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & gold warp. Green,tan, metallic bronze weft.Twill.Stapled to an 8.5 x 11.5 piece of white tagboard.  \"Pomegranite H>W>\" and \"H-8A\" written on card. (orange, yellow, light green, tan, bronze metallic)
